invalid-status.title: The provided trick status is invalid!
invalid-status.description: Check your URL. Only the values "official", "userDefined" and "archived" are allowed at the status position in "/tricks/<status>/<id>".

invalid-id.title: The provided trick id is invalid!
invalid-id.description: Check your URL. Only numbers are allowed at the id position in "/tricks/<status>/<id>".

trick-not-in-db.title: This trick does not exist in your database!
trick-not-in-db.description: You tried to access a trick, which is not stored on your device.
